basic.floral_language:
Ligustrum japonicum 
Floriography: kind, handsome, optimistic
Ligustrum japonicum is a beautiful eye-catching deciduous shrub with oval leaves in golden yellow. Often planted as ornamental trees in the garden, street, parks, and other places, or to form hedges, shaped trees, and other landscaping models.
Ligustrum japonicum likes light with a little shade tolerance. When conditions are right, blooms with white flowers.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like light, and slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
